name: Beat Hazard 2
description: Experience your music collection as never before with this intense music driven arcade shooter. Each of your songs will have its own unique ebb and flow based on the music.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.5GHz processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 670 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 3.0GHz processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 690 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 250 MB available space
